Package Server.game.player.humanPlayer

Class HumanPlayer

java.lang.Object
Server.game.player.Player
Server.game.player.humanPlayer.HumanPlayer
public class HumanPlayer extends Player
Represents a human player in the game. Handles interaction with the client via object messages and manages player input like shooting and ship placement.

  • Constructor Summary

    Default constructor.

    Constructs a human player with a given map size and ship configuration.
